title: New York Times Buys Wordle
sub_head: Media company says price paid for viral word game is in low-seven figures
body:
The New York Times said it bought Wordle, the word game that has become an online phenomenon.
The media company said it paid a price in the low-seven figures. The game will move from its current website to the New York Times site and apps, but the company declined to say when that would happen.
